title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 450.3 - Payroll records and audits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 450.3 - Payroll records and audits

State Regulations

Audits of the payroll records of the risks insured with the

State Insurance Fund shall be made at such times as is provided by the terms of
the insurance policy and as often as may be necessary for the purposes of the

State Fund and statements from assureds of the number of employees and the
amount of payroll in the business insured may be required as
needed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
450.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
